Articles.Content: It looks like the cover for the GTA Series. Grand theft Kerbal would be cool! Robbing rockets, robbing more rockets... actually, that game would get boring fast.

Grand Theft Rover: Kerbin City. A massive city and outlying area to explore, dozens of side activities, a rich and complex story, and a believable, anti-hero protagonist who constantly gets called by his cousin asking if he wants to go bowling.
Too many mods. It's my view that a Kerbal disk cover should show off only stock KSP.
It wasn't meant to pitch the game, I made it for fun

Grand Theft Rover: Kerbin City. A massive city and outlying area to explore, dozens of side activities, a rich and complex story, and a believable, anti-hero protagonist who constantly gets called by his cousin asking if he wants to go bowling.

A little off topic. This is awesome. Its now my signature. Darn that's funny!!! Have some Rep!

MSD: I think that you should make another DVD cover along these lines.
